content: is there such a thing as  mobile CSS for tasks.hotosm.org?

Yes, there is a mobile CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) for tasks.hotosm.org, which is the website for the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team (HOT) Tasking Manager. The mobile CSS ensures that the website is properly displayed and optimized for mobile devices, providing an enhanced user experience for mobile users accessing tasks.hotosm.org on their smartphones or tablets.
